AnyTIFound.description: true if any TI matches were found for any entity type

DetailedResults.description: Array of matching Threat Intelligence data

TIType.description: TI indicator Type in DetailedResults array

SourceSystem.description: TI Source System in DetailedResults array

Description.description: TI indicator description in DetailedResults array

ConfidenceScore.description: TI confidence score in DetailedResults array

IndicatorId.description: TI indicator Id in DetailedResults array

DomainEntitiesCount.description: Count of Domain Entities in Incident

DomainEntitiesWithTI.description: Count of Domain Entities in Incident with matching Threat Intelligence

DomainTIFound.description: true if any TI matches were found for Domain entity type

IPTIFound.description: true if any TI matches were found for IP entity type
